description: React component for displaying a history of weekly reports fetched from a Supabase backend, including loading, error handling, and RLS guidance hints.

methods.name: truncate
methods.description: Truncates a string to a specified length, appending an ellipsis if necessary.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a date string into a locale-specific string.

methods.name: formatWeek
methods.description: Formats a week start date into ISO date string (YYYY-MM-DD).

methods.name: fetchReports
methods.description: Fetches weekly reports from the backend, updates state, and handles errors including RLS guidance hints.
